name: The Final Frontier (itch) (BinaryPrinciple)
description:
LD48 is the new submarine that was built specially for going down one of the deepest trenches in the world, and try to clean up the parts of previous failed submarines. 

Stil,l you are curious,.. yeah we need to clean it, but you might be the first to find something special in the deep. 

You will go collecting parts, avoiding dangers and trying to reach the bottom. 

A 3D scroll platformer, with a tetris feel and collectables.
